lines: It seems as though your coach is already bursting at the seams.
This is not acceptable, my lord.
For a small fee, I will create additional space to make your onward journey as pleasant as possible.
options: Add seats to carriage (400 Gold coins)

lines: It will be ready faster that you thought.
You will have to travel along in your tight space, then.
Your coin won't pay for my expenses, it seems. I have a family to feed and times are dark.
You will have to leave people behind.
New places are installed in your coach. You should be able to take more passengers aboard now.
Now, you have all the places that I could possibly add to a carriage of this make.
Enjoy the additional space and use it well.
No more places can be added on to this structure without breaking it apart.
You will have to build a new one someday... but alas, I can't provide this service here.
